ValidationRule.description: For ETS Hot Lists, the rep needs to create or attach a Reseller Contact based on the Reseller Email value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNEW()) && NOT(ISBLANK(Reseller_Contact_Email__c)) && ISBLANK( Reseller_Contact__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK(ETS_ID__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS( $Profile.Name , "Marketo")) && NOT(CONTAINS( $Profile.Name , "System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please create a new Contact using the Reseller Contact Email. If an existing Contact already has that email address, add that Contact as the Reseller Contact.
